Description:
Required skills to be successfulManual dexterity, technical, mechanical and advanced computer skills
Takes ownership in all aspects of their role, working without close supervision and demonstrating effective self-management
Ability to read and interpret complex documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, repair manuals and Wiring diagrams
Capability to follow the system of quality control inspection to prevent or correct faulty workmanship which falls below the standard
Ability to write technical reports on AGR cases after performing diagnosing
Excellent communication skills About the TeamThe role will report to the Service Manager and you will be working in a busy workshop environment wherein you will be dealing directly with Service Advisor, Controller, Foreman & co-Technicians in a daily basis. What equips you for the roleDiploma Technical certification, ITI (Industrial Training Institute NCVT Certificate) or ITC
Must be a Toyota Certified Technician
Achieve Diagnostic Master Technician certification from Automotive Academy
5 yearsâ€™ experience as Diagnostic Technician, preference to retail automotive experience.
Must have valid UAE driving licenseJob Details
